scripts.browser-build: ionic cordova build browser --prod --aot && npm run hashmark && gulp set-no-cache
scripts.browser-debug: npm run browser-build && gulp copy-code-browser-debug && npm run copy-debug
scripts.browser-prod: gulp edit-config-browser-prod && npm run browser-build && gulp edit-config-prod && gulp set-config && gulp copy-code-browser-prod
scripts.wx-prod: gulp edit-config-wx-prod && npm run browser-build && gulp edit-config-prod && gulp set-config && gulp copy-code-browser-prod
scripts.wx-debug: gulp edit-config-wx-debug && npm run browser-build && gulp set-config && gulp copy-code-browser-prod
scripts.android-release-prod: jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore app.jks -signedjar ./platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/www/app.apk ./platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk app.jks -storepass pass2debug -keypass pass2debug
scripts.android-debug: cordova-hcp build && gulp set-hot-code-android-chcp-debug && gulp environments-dataUrl-debug && gulp edit-config-debug && gulp set-config && npm run android-build && npm run android-chcp && gulp copy-hot-code-android-debug && gulp copy-debug-apk
scripts.android-prod: ionic cordova resources android -f && cordova-hcp build && gulp set-hot-code-android-chcp-prod && gulp environments-dataUrl-prod && gulp edit-config-prod && gulp set-config && npm run android-release && npm run android-release-prod && npm run android-chcp && gulp copy-hot-code-android-prod
scripts.ios-debug: cordova-hcp build && gulp set-hot-code-ios-chcp-debug && gulp environments-dataUrl-debug && gulp set-config && npm run ios-build  && npm run ios-chcp
scripts.ios-prod: ionic cordova resources ios -f && cordova-hcp build && gulp set-hot-code-ios-chcp-prod && gulp environments-dataUrl-prod && gulp set-config && npm run ios-build  && npm run ios-chcp
scripts.ios-prepare-debug: cordova-hcp build && gulp set-hot-code-ios-chcp-debug && gulp environments-dataUrl-debug && gulp edit-config-debug && gulp set-config && npm run ios-prepare && npm run ios-chcp && gulp copy-hot-code-ios-debug
scripts.ios-prepare-prod: ionic cordova resources ios -f && cordova-hcp build && gulp set-hot-code-ios-chcp-prod && gulp environments-dataUrl-prod && gulp edit-config-prod && gulp set-config && npm run ios-prepare && npm run ios-chcp && gulp copy-hot-code-ios-prod
scripts.build-prod: npm run android-prod && npm run ios-prepare-prod && npm run browser-prod
scripts.publish-prod: npm run git-pull && npm run build-prod && npm run ftp-prod && npm run git-push
scripts.gulp-publish-prod: npm run android-prod && gulp zip && gulp ssh
scripts.gulp-publish-wx-debug: npm run wx-debug && gulp zip-browser && gulp ssh-browser-debug
scripts.wx-build: npm run browser-build && gulp wx-init && npm run wx-build-zhuosong && npm run wx-build-tulin-prod && npm run wx-build-tulin-debug && gulp git
